reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of ECON 101, ECON 310.
"Project Monitoring and Evaluation for Timely Responses (METR)": METR measures the right things in the right way at the right time aimed at encouraging positive timely changes in behavior for development projects among (1) Project implementers, (2) Project beneficiaries, (3) Project designers and (4) Policy makers to bring about reforms that provide better enabling conditions for lasting equitable growth and development.
courseName: Current Issues in Food and Resource Economics
